content: the crochet bunny egg is the perfect project to use for decorating at easter time or sparking imaginative play year-round the beginner-friendly pattern works up quickly and can be customized in a variety of ways will you choose long or short ears crocheted colored or plain inner ears a cute pom pom tail or no tail ate all smaller in size they are also a great way to use up scrap yarn and practice a variety of embroidery techniques get ready for one of the cutest stash busters yet the crochet bunny egg is great to use as gifts for all ages easter decor decoration imaginative play and more pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is advanced beginner but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase invisible decrease working in the back bar of the chain and the adjustable magic ring + hand embroidery is also used in this project materials needed + yarn in your choice of colors about 39-44yds/36-40 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + poly-fil stuffing + pins + scissors + chopstick to help stuff + safety eyes 8mm + embroidery floss + embroidery needle + chopstick dowel or something similar to help with stuffing + 1 ⅝ inch 45 mm clover pom pom maker finished measurements using hook size e/4 3 5 mm the crochet bunny egg measures approximately 2 ⅝ inches 6 7 cm tall not including the ears approximately 4 inches 10 cm tall including the pointy ears and approximately 6 5 inches 16 5 cm in circumference thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here on ravelry and the blog at www
